n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>HHA_PROD</SCHEMA> <NAME>ZATCA_ACCOUNTINGSUPPLIERPARTY__</NAME> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INVOICE_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SCHEMEID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>STREETNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BUILDINGNUMBER</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PLOTIDENTIFICATION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CITYSUBDIVISIONNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CITYNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>POSTALZONE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRYSUBENTITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>IDENTIFICATIONCODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COMPANYID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ID_TAXSCHEME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>REGISTRATIONNAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>SELECT '100' INVOICE_ID, '123457890' ID, 'MLS' schemeID, 'Bab makkah' StreetName, 1234 BuildingNumber, 1234 PlotIdentification, 'Bab Makkah' CitySubdivisionName, 'Jeddah' CityName, 12643 PostalZone, 'Makkah Region' CountrySubentity, 'SA' IdentificationCode, '300075588700003' CompanyID, -- sdk Vat 300055184400003 API Vat 300075588700003 HHA VAT --300210958810003 --300210958810003 'VAT' ID_TAXSCHEME, 'Haji Husein Alireza Co. Ltd' RegistrationName --'Haji Husein Alireza Co. Ltd' --Al Salam Supplies Co. LTD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '100' INVOICE_ID, '123C12345678' ID, 'SAG' schemeID, 'King Abdullah Road' StreetName, 3709 BuildingNumber, 1004 PlotIdentification, 'Al Mursalat' CitySubdivisionName, 'Riyadh' CityName, 11564 PostalZone, 'Riyadh Region' CountrySubentity, 'SA' IdentificationCode, NULL CompanyID, 'VAT' ID_TAXSCHEME, 'AL KAWTHAR MARKETS' RegistrationName FROM DUAL </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
